text: Robert Rietti, born Lucio Rietti and usually credited as Robert Rietty (8 February 1923 - 3 April 2015), was a British-born Italian actor, director and playwright. He was knighted by the Italian government. Rietti died on 3 April 2015, aged 92 ==References== ==Other website== * Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British movie directors Category:British playwrights Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian movie directors
title: Robert Rietti
